price: Na yalipo onana majeshi mawili haya, watu wa Musa wakasema: Hakika sisi bila ya shaka tumepatikana!
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ
footnotes: Walipo onana makundi mawili, watu wa Musa walisema: Hakika Firauni na watu wake watatupata. Basi tutaangamia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
